title: Bug 9619: Move static member: Dialog details
description:
Bug 9619: Move static member: Dialog details
20020212a.
Mnemonics
No validation on the type field. Type existence is not too expensive (done in the type wizard for super class), so it could be done.
At least isValidTypeName.
Label could say 'Select destination type:'.
OB: The software does not validate the type field.
EB: The software should validate the type field. The label should say 'Select destination type:'.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the dialog window for Move static field(s).
2. Enter a value in the type field.
3. Observe that the software does not validate the type field and the label does not say 'Select destination type:'.
